name: MIS Sexual Orientation
description:
Provides a summary and detailed breakdown by establishment of active prisoners and sexual orientation. The report prompts for one, multiple or 'All' establishment code(s).
PDD0041 - v00.00.00

dataset.name: Prisoner Data
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK >= 1) UNION SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, '-' FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK < 1)), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE IS NULL THEN 'No Data Entered' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'BIS' THEN 'Bisexual' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'HOM' THEN 'Gay / Lesbian' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'HET' THEN 'Hetero - sexual / Straight' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'REF' THEN 'Refused' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'ND' THEN 'Not Disclosed' ELSE CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE = 'OTH' THEN 'Other' END END END END END END END AS VSEXODESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Sexo Codes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DT_ALL_SEXO_CODES.SEXO_CODE FROM (SELECT 'BIS' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual UNION SELECT 'HET' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual UNION SELECT 'HOM' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual UNION SELECT 'ND' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual UNION SELECT 'OTH' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual UNION SELECT 'REF' AS SEXO_CODE FROM dual) DT_ALL_SEXO_CODES), dataset_ AS (SELECT SEXO_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_NAME NOT(IN ('GHOST HOLDING ESTABLISHMENT','TRANSFER')))

field.name: $ref:VSEXODESCRIPTION
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Sexual Orientation Code]);"No Data Entered";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="BIS";"Bisexual";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="HOM";"Gay / Lesbian";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="HET";"Hetero - sexual / Straight";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="REF";"Refused";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="ND";"Not Disclosed";If([Sexual Orientation Code]="OTH";"Other")))))))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_NAME NOT(IN ('TRANSFER','GHOST HOLDING ESTABLISHMENT')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_NAME NOT(IN ('TRANSFER','GHOST HOLDING ESTABLISHMENT')))

errors.error: instance.report[0].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
